thread.title: Tech Giants Could Make Visa Reform Work
thread.title_full: Tech Giants Could Make Visa Reform Work - WSJ

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Tech Giants Could Make Visa Reform Work
text:
Big U.S. technology companies worried about potential changes to America’s worker visa programs under President Donald Trump could—ironically—make a case that might appeal to the nationalistic ethos of the new administration.

Of course, that depends on the details, none of which are certain at this point. A draft executive order circulating around Washington directs the government to re-examine immigration programs, including the...
